gobblin.metrics

Class ContextAwareCounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codahale.metrics.Counter
      • gobblin.metrics.ContextAwareCounter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.codahale.metrics.Counting, com.codahale.metrics.Metric, ContextAwareMetric, ProxyMetric

    public class ContextAwareCounter
extends com.codahale.metrics.Counter
implements ProxyMetric, ContextAwareMetric
    A type of Counters that are aware of their MetricContext and can have associated Tags.

    Any updates to a ContextAwareCounter will be applied automatically to the ContextAwareCounter of the same name in the parent MetricContext.

    This class wraps a Counter and delegates calls to public methods of Counter to the wrapped Counter.
